attributes.action: Stop the Solar Farm in Kemsing - An Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty
attributes.additional_details:
A ONE HUNDRED ACRE SOLAR PANEL FARM NEAR KEMSING STATION IN A DESIGNATED AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEAUTY.

The St Clere Estate has indicated their intention to apply for planning permission to install over 110,000 solar panels across 111 acres in an ‘Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty’.

All petitioners support renewable energy initiatives that are on brownfield areas. We vehemently oppose this plan. We want government support to have this plan rejected or moved to a brownfield area.
